text:
Seems to be an intermittent problem. I'll upload my problematic file.
When I call TextBox getRichTextRuns() with this file, I get a array of length
11, but in fact the correct value is 6. Some character styles seems to be misplaced.

text:
Created attachment 18852
One slide presentation

The error occurs in the second placeholder.

Could you test with the latest svn version of poi? Hopefully this is now fixed,
but you're probably in a better position to check if things are as expected.
